Rulings.Base:
1. You can activate "Intercept Wave" even if only 1 player controls a Synchro Monster.
2. You can activate "Intercept Wave" even while "G.B. Hunter" is face-up on the field. In that case, you'll switch the Synchro Monsters to Defense Position, but you won't return them to the Extra Deck in the End Phase.
3. You cannot activate "Intercept Wave" during the Damage Step.
4. Synchro Monsters that were not changed to Defense Position by "Intercept Wave" will still be returned to the Extra Deck during the End Phase.
5. You cannot activate "Intercept Wave" if there are no Attack Position Synchro Monsters on the field.
6. At least 1 monster must be changed to Defense Position by "Intercept Wave" or else the effect to return Synchro Monsters to the Extra Deck will not be applied.
7. Returning the Synchro Monsters to the Extra Deck does not start a Chain.
